import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import QRCode from 'qrcode.react'; import '../static/ticket.css'; import logo from '../logo.png'; import Footer from './Footer'; export default function Ticket () { const [ticket, setTicket] = useState(0); const ticketData = { id: 'CIN32', movieTitle: 'Avengers: Endgame', cinema: 'Cineplex Cinemas', date: '2023-06-10', time: '19:30', payment: 'Paid', seatNumber: 'A1' }; return ( <>

date generated: {ticketData.date}

Ticket ID:

{ticketData.id}

Movie:

{ticketData.movieTitle}

Cinema:

{ticketData.cinema}

Streaming:

{ticketData.date}

Time:

{ticketData.time}

Payment:

{ticketData.payment}

Seat Number:

{ticketData.seatNumber}

); }
